titles.title: He Who Began A Good Work

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He who, began a good work in you He who, began a good work in you Will be faithful to complete it He’ll be faithful to complete it He who started the work Will be faithful to complete it in You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Brothers) You can be sure that the Lord has His hand on you Safe and secure He will never abandon you You are His treasure and He finds His pleasure in you.{/lang-eng}
